events.comment: Zed and Max see the treasure. Camera pans up and then back, some more conversation about how yes, that is the treasure.
Zed blows up rocks if Max can't.

sub-events.comment: If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
Otherwise the MOB just stands idle.

events.comment: When Max picks up the artifact, let loose the bugs.

sub-events.comment: Check to see if treasure chest is ransacked.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
